title: 535 I Am Trusting Thee, Lord Jesus

lines: 1. I am trusting Thee, Lord Jesus, Trusting only Thee; Trusting Thee for full salvation, Great and free.
2. I am trusting Thee for pardon; At Thy feet I bow; For Thy grace and tender mercy, Trusting now.
3. I am trusting Thee to guide me; Thou alone shalt lead, Every day and hour supplying All my need.
4. I am trusting Thee, Lord Jesus; Never let me fall; I am trusting Thee forever, And for all.
